newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade slow $68,steady - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade slow $68,steady - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area Friday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady. Feedlots reporting good inquiry from buyers.
Sales reported on 3,700 slaughter steers and 100 slaughter heifers following the weekly movement of 104,500.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 68.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-3 1200 lbs 67.25.
Slaughter Heifers - Small pen Select and Choice 2-3 1050 lbs 68.00.
